update_free_support_time_remaining

update_free_support_time_remaining.Rmd

update_free_support_time_remaining enforces a business rule to provide a free customer service consultation of up to one hour for each REDCap project. It reads the customer service database, groups the data by project ID, and determines which projects have logged hours which should receive hourly rate adjust down to $0/hour. This marks the records as pro bono. Those records will be invoiced like other work but at the $0/hour rate and the “pro bono” label.

update_free_support_time_remaining data processing workflow

Developed by Philip Chase, Laurence James-Woodley, Kyle Chesney, Michael Bentz, Sai Pavan Kamma.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.0.
